venue.name: Blackstone River Valley Bikeway @ The Blackstone River State Park

item.description:
We got rained off of Martha's Vineyard, but the forecast for Sunday is cloudy. Let's keep our fingers crossed and try for a more local ride:

Â 

**** Please be sure to check this posting Sunday morning for weather updates. I will send out my cell number to Yes RSVP's, but don't want to post here********************

The Blackstone River Bikepath is a really pretty ride; going along the Blackstone River, there are a few waterfalls to see. For the most part is a flat easier ride, with only a few hills. It is about 10 miles each way, and we'll be doing the whole thing at a slow/moderate pace (10-15mph)

The best part about this bike path... bathrooms!!! And even a DD up a long hill if we chose to stop there on the way back.

I'll send my cell phone number to "yes" RSVPs the day before. There are multiple parking lots, so please be sure you know which one we are meeting at, and feel free to contact me if you have any questions.

Hope you can make it!

For information about the bikepath and directions, check out the website: http://www.nps.gov/blac/planyourvisit/blackstone-river-bikeway-the-rhode-island-section.htm

This is a cross post event w/ Boston Providence Single Parents group
item.how_to_find_us: Will either have Roger's blue mini van or my Gold Subaru

group.name: Boston Metro Hike Bike & Social Club

item.name: Last Minute Bike Ride on Blackstone River Bike Path - Lincoln RI
